list_translation_mean.translate_mean: kim tự tháp ở ai cập

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a monumental structure with a square or triangular base and sloping sides that meet in a point at the top, especially one built of stone as a royal tomb in ancient Egypt.
an object, shape, or arrangement in the form of a pyramid.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một kim tự tháp của các bản ghi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a system of financial growth achieved by a small initial investment, with subsequent investments being funded by using unrealized profits as collateral.
